ygData.subject: RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the Plane of Hate was opened last night with the conclusion of that disaterous quest that seemed to take the servers down.  So rejoice in the fact
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the Plane of Hate was opened last night with the conclusion of
that disaterous quest that seemed to take the servers down. So rejoice in
the fact that the zone is both open and populated =)

Treilanin Loreweaver

On Wed, 27 Oct 1999, David Knadler wrote:

> From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
>
> >> A fellow bard has heard rumor of a bard only "ultimate"
> > weapon called the
> > quill that procs gate. He says it is found in the Plane of
> > Hate on the
> > Maestro of Rancor.
>
> Plane of Hate? I thought that wasn't going to be "open" to the general
> public until march (when, allegedly, the expansion is coming out).
>
> Desmei Sightblinder
> Lvl 30 Bard [Povar]
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with the subject lol.
>
